ports.title: L'Abbaye des Morts
ports.description: A platformer inspired by ZX Spectrum games, set in 13th-century France. Players control Jean Raymond, a Cathar monk fleeing from crusaders who discovers ancient evils in an abandoned church.

ports.title: Darius: Extra Version
ports.description: An enhanced port of the classic arcade shoot-'em-up Darius. Players pilot the Silver Hawk spacecraft through horizontally scrolling stages, battling waves of enemy forces and massive bosses.

re-releases.title: Earnest Evans
re-releases.developer: Edia, Limited Run Games, Wolf Team

re-releases.title: Jim Power: The Lost Dimension
re-releases.description: An action platformer where players control Jim Power on a mission to save the president's daughter from the evil Vaprak. Features challenging levels with a mix of side-scrolling and top-down perspectives.

re-releases.title: Duke Nukem 3D
re-releases.description: The classic first-person shooter Duke Nukem 3D re-released for the Sega Genesis with enhanced features and improved performance.

re-releases.title: Generals of the Yang Family
re-releases.description: A strategy game based on the legendary Chinese tale of the Yang family generals, featuring tactical battles and historical elements.

re-releases.title: Mega Turrican
re-releases.description: The classic action platformer Mega Turrican re-released with enhanced graphics and sound, featuring the iconic grappling hook mechanics.

re-releases.title: Panorama Cotton
re-releases.description: A 3D rail shooter featuring the witch Cotton on a quest to save the fairy kingdom. Known for its vibrant graphics and fast-paced gameplay.

re-releases.title: Zero Tolerance Origins
re-releases.description: A compilation of the classic first-person shooter Zero Tolerance and its unreleased sequel. Players combat alien threats in a variety of environments.

re-releases.title: Steel Empire
re-releases.description: A steampunk-themed side-scrolling shooter where players pilot airships to defeat an evil empire. Praised for its unique setting and engaging gameplay.

re-releases.title: Stone Protectors
re-releases.description: A beat 'em up game based on the animated series, where players control characters with unique abilities to defeat enemies and save the kingdom.

re-releases.title: Legend of Wukong
re-releases.description: An RPG inspired by the classic Chinese tale Journey to the West, where players embark on a quest filled with battles and exploration.

re-releases.title: Mega 3D Noah's Ark
re-releases.description: A unique first-person shooter where players, as Noah, use a slingshot to pacify animals on the ark. Known for its family-friendly content and distinctive gameplay.
